title: SET_PLAYER_INVINCIBLE
content:
0xDFB9A2A2// SetPlayerInvincible
void SET_PLAYER_INVINCIBLE(Player player, BOOL bInvincible);Parameters:player: The player index.bInvincible: Make the player impervious to all forms of damage.This is the server-side RPC native equivalent of the client native SET_PLAYER_INVINCIBLE.
codeBlocks:
// SetPlayerInvincible
void SET_PLAYER_INVINCIBLE(Player player, BOOL bInvincible);

local player = PlayerId()
-- Example usage for SET_PLAYER_INVINCIBLE
SetPlayerInvincible(player, false)
